mission.title: Our mission
mission.description: OurSupport aims to keep people and their communities digitally connected by providing convenient IT support services and economic advantages to both customers and our community of IT technicians.
mission.card4Description: Easy to use mobile and web platform.

values.title: Our values
values.value1Description: We are constantly learning from everything we do each day, to improve the quality and the way we do it.
values.value2Description: We aim to be provide the best quality and experience and strive to keep our customers and representatives happy.
values.value3Description: We improve the quality of services and innovate for our customers each day.
values.value4Description: We are constantly improving our platform and the quality of our services, using the latest trends and technologies.
values.value5Description: OurSupport is a global IT community, we all collaborate with ideas and suggestions to achieve efficient and cost effective solutions.
values.value6Description: We strive to be transparent with our customers and representatives this is a formula for strengthening our relationships as one team.

community.title: Oursupport community
community.descriptionTitle: We are one IT support Community.
community.description:
We are one team, and each person is equally important.

OurSupport works with a team of amazing IT professionals, making it easy to leverage off the experience and knowledge that each one brings to the IT support community.

Imagine the knowledge and experience of 1000´s of IT professionals behind every request for IT help!

support.title: It has never been easier to get IT support
support.description:
Technology is becoming more entrenched into our daily lives, the way we work and from where we work has changed, we are no longer bound to or within geographical borders.

Technology was once an escape from the real world, today technology is the real world.

footer.description: User-friendly platform linking those seeking IT tech support with a global community of locally available IT experts.
